title: Type - Stock Parent
description: Type representation of the parent security of a given stock issuance (e.g. if a stock issuance came from a plan, such as an RSA, or if a stock came from a previous stock entry)

parent_object_type.description: Parent object type for this stock issuance (e.g. a stock plan or warrant)

parent_object_id.description: Parent object's ID must be a valid ID pointing to an object of the type specified in parent_object_type
